entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:47 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:47 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
